title.narrative: Ethiopia - Harar Water Supply and Sanitation Project
Éthiopie - Projet d'approvisionnement en eau et d'assainissement de Harar

description.narrative: To improve access to water supply and sanitation services in Harar, Alemaya, Awudai, Adele and Dengego through improved water production, distribution and sanitation for improved health, poverty alleviation and economic growth.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
